name: Rhythm Wrangler
description:
Yer herd's gotten out and those darned aliens have a hankerin' for steak! Best rescue your cows before they become roast beef!

Rescue cows to the beat with your trusty lasso!

Dodge aliens while they try to abduct the cows...or you!

Twitch chat controls the speed of the music, don't get tripped up, pardner!
